function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale real-time data capture infrastructure may pose privacy risks if data is not anonymized effectively.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive data, potential surveillance of individuals, and privacy breaches.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data anonymization protocols, encryption, and access controls. Obtain informed consent for data collection and usage.","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, encryption algorithms, access control systems.","People":"City residents, visitors, and anyone captured by the data sensors.","Owner":"Data scientists, programmers, and city authorities."},{"Description":"Close collaboration with local authorities and citizen partners may increase the risk of disease transmission if proper health and safety measures are not followed.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, including COVID-19, among the UO team members, local authorities, and citizen partners.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict health and safety protocols, provide personal protective equipment, and promote vaccination and testing initiatives.","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, contact tracing technology, remote collaboration tools.","People":"UO team members, local authorities, citizen partners.","Owner":"UO project managers, local authority leaders."},{"Description":"Publication of real-time urban movement data and COVID-19 dashboard may lead to public panic or misinformation if not presented and interpreted accurately.","Impact":"Public panic, misinformation, and distrust in the data provided by the UO.","Mitigation":"Train stakeholders on accurate data interpretation, provide context with the data visualizations, and communicate uncertainties transparently.","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, communication platforms, training and educational resources.","People":"General public, local authorities, citizen partners.","Owner":"Data scientists, communication specialists, UO project managers."}]}
